32  import org.hibernate.Criteria;

56  /**
57   * Functional entity transactional tests.
58   *
59   * @author Galder Zamarre√±o
60   * @since 3.5
61   */
62  public class BasicTransactionalTestCase extends AbstractFunctionalTestCase {
63  
64  	@Override
65  	public void configure(Configuration cfg) {
66  		super.configure( cfg );
67  	}
68  
69     @Override
70     protected Class<?>[] getAnnotatedClasses() {
71        return new Class[] {
72              Citizen.class, State.class,
73              NaturalIdOnManyToOne.class
74        };
75     }
76  
77     @After
78     public void cleanupData() throws Exception {
79        super.cleanupCache();
80        withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
81           @Override
82           public Void call() throws Exception {
83              Session s = sessionFactory().openSession();
84              s.beginTransaction();
85              s.createQuery( "delete NaturalIdOnManyToOne" ).executeUpdate();
86              s.createQuery( "delete Citizen" ).executeUpdate();
87              s.createQuery( "delete State" ).executeUpdate();
88              s.getTransaction().commit();
89              s.close();
90              return null;
91           }
92        });
93     }
94  
95  	@Test
96  	public void testCollectionCache() throws Exception {
97  		final Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
98  		stats.clear();
99  
100 		final Item item = new Item( "chris", "Chris's Item" );
101 		final Item another = new Item( "another", "Owned Item" );
102 		item.addItem( another );
103 
104       withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
105          @Override
106          public Void call() throws Exception {
107             Session s = openSession();
108             s.getTransaction().begin();
109             s.persist( item );
110             s.persist( another );
111             s.getTransaction().commit();
112             s.close();
113             return null;
114          }
115       });
116 
117       withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
118          @Override
119          public Void call() throws Exception {
120             Session s = openSession();
121             Item loaded = (Item) s.load( Item.class, item.getId() );
122             assertEquals( 1, loaded.getItems().size() );
123             s.close();
124             return null;
125          }
126       });
127 
128       withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
129          @Override
130          public Void call() throws Exception {
131             Session s = openSession();
132             s.getTransaction().begin();
133             SecondLevelCacheStatistics cStats = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() + ".items" );
134             Item loadedWithCachedCollection = (Item) s.load( Item.class, item.getId() );
135             stats.logSummary();
136             assertEquals( item.getName(), loadedWithCachedCollection.getName() );
137             assertEquals( item.getItems().size(), loadedWithCachedCollection.getItems().size() );
138             assertEquals( 1, cStats.getHitCount() );
139             Map cacheEntries = cStats.getEntries();
140             assertEquals( 1, cacheEntries.size() );
141             Item itemElement = loadedWithCachedCollection.getItems().iterator().next();
142             itemElement.setOwner( null );
143             loadedWithCachedCollection.getItems().clear();
144             s.delete( itemElement );
145             s.delete( loadedWithCachedCollection );
146             s.getTransaction().commit();
147             s.close();
148             return null;
149          }
150       });
151 	}
152 
153 	@Test
154 	@TestForIssue( jiraKey = "HHH-9231" )
155 	public void testAddNewOneToManyElementInitFlushLeaveCacheConsistent() throws Exception {
156 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
157 		stats.clear();
158 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics cStats = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() + ".items" );
159 
160 		Item item = null;
161 		Transaction txn = null;
162 		Session s = null;
163 
164 		beginTx();
165 		try {
166 			s = openSession();
167 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
168 			item = new Item();
169 			item.setName( "steve" );
170 			item.setDescription( "steve's item" );
171 			s.save( item );
172 			txn.commit();
173 			s.close();
174 		}
175 		catch (Exception e) {
176 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
177 		}
178 		finally {
179 			commitOrRollbackTx();
180 		}
181 
182 		// create an element for item.itsms
183 		Item itemElement = new Item();
184 		itemElement.setName( "element" );
185 		itemElement.setDescription( "element item" );
186 
187 		beginTx();
188 		try {
189 			s = openSession();
190 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
191 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
192 			assertFalse( Hibernate.isInitialized( item.getItems() ) );
193 			// Add an element to item.items (a Set); it will initialize the Set.
194 			item.addItem( itemElement );
195 			assertTrue( Hibernate.isInitialized( item.getItems() ) );
196 			s.persist( itemElement );
197 			s.flush();
198 			setRollbackOnlyTx();
199 		}
200 		catch (Exception e) {
201 			setRollbackOnlyTxExpected(e);
202 		}
203 		finally {
204 			commitOrRollbackTx();
205 			if ( s != null && s.isOpen() ) {
206 				try {
207 					s.close();
208 				}
209 				catch (Throwable ignore) {
210 				}
211 			}
212 		}
213 
214 		beginTx();
215 		try {
216 			// cleanup
217 			s = openSession();
218 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
219 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
220 			Hibernate.initialize( item.getItems() );
221 			assertTrue( item.getItems().isEmpty() );
222 			s.delete( item );
223 			txn.commit();
224 			s.close();
225 		}
226 		catch (Exception e) {
227 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
228 		}
229 		finally {
230 			commitOrRollbackTx();
231 		}
232 	}
233 
234 	@Test
235 	@TestForIssue( jiraKey = "HHH-9231" )
236 	public void testAddNewOneToManyElementNoInitFlushLeaveCacheConsistent() throws Exception {
237 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
238 		stats.clear();
239 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics cStats = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() + ".items" );
240 
241 		Item item = null;
242 		Transaction txn = null;
243 		Session s = null;
244 
245 		beginTx();
246 		try {
247 			s = openSession();
248 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
249 			item = new Item();
250 			item.setName( "steve" );
251 			item.setDescription( "steve's item" );
252 			s.save( item );
253 			txn.commit();
254 			s.close();
255 		}
256 		catch (Exception e) {
257 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
258 		}
259 		finally {
260 			commitOrRollbackTx();
261 		}
262 
263 		// create an element for item.bagOfItems
264 		Item itemElement = new Item();
265 		itemElement.setName( "element" );
266 		itemElement.setDescription( "element item" );
267 
268 		beginTx();
269 		try {
270 			s = openSession();
271 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
272 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
273 			assertFalse( Hibernate.isInitialized( item.getItems() ) );
274 			// Add an element to item.bagOfItems (a bag); it will not initialize the bag.
275 			item.addItemToBag( itemElement );
276 			assertFalse( Hibernate.isInitialized( item.getBagOfItems() ) );
277 			s.persist( itemElement );
278 			s.flush();
279 			setRollbackOnlyTx();
280 		}
281 		catch (Exception e) {
282 			setRollbackOnlyTxExpected(e);
283 		}
284 		finally {
285 			commitOrRollbackTx();
286 			if ( s != null && s.isOpen() ) {
287 				try {
288 					s.close();
289 				}
290 				catch (Throwable ignore) {
291 				}
292 			}
293 		}
294 
295 		beginTx();
296 		try {
297 			// cleanup
298 			s = openSession();
299 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
300 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
301 			Hibernate.initialize( item.getItems() );
302 			assertTrue( item.getItems().isEmpty() );
303 			s.delete( item );
304 			txn.commit();
305 			s.close();
306 		}
307 		catch (Exception e) {
308 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
309 		}
310 		finally {
311 			commitOrRollbackTx();
312 		}
313 	}
314 
315 	@Test
316 	public void testAddNewOneToManyElementNoInitFlushInitLeaveCacheConsistent() throws Exception {
317 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
318 		stats.clear();
319 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics cStats = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() + ".items" );
320 
321 		Item item = null;
322 		Transaction txn = null;
323 		Session s = null;
324 
325 		beginTx();
326 		try {
327 			s = openSession();
328 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
329 			item = new Item();
330 			item.setName( "steve" );
331 			item.setDescription( "steve's item" );
332 			s.save( item );
333 			txn.commit();
334 			s.close();
335 		}
336 		catch (Exception e) {
337 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
338 		}
339 		finally {
340 			commitOrRollbackTx();
341 		}
342 
343 		// create an element for item.bagOfItems
344 		Item itemElement = new Item();
345 		itemElement.setName( "element" );
346 		itemElement.setDescription( "element item" );
347 
348 		beginTx();
349 		try {
350 			s = openSession();
351 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
352 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
353 			assertFalse( Hibernate.isInitialized( item.getBagOfItems() ) );
354 			// Add an element to item.bagOfItems (a bag); it will not initialize the bag.
355 			item.addItemToBag( itemElement );
356 			assertFalse( Hibernate.isInitialized( item.getBagOfItems() ) );
357 			s.persist( itemElement );
358 			s.flush();
359 			// Now initialize the collection; it will contain the uncommitted itemElement.
360 			Hibernate.initialize( item.getBagOfItems() );
361 			setRollbackOnlyTx();
362 		}
363 		catch (Exception e) {
364 			setRollbackOnlyTxExpected(e);
365 		}
366 		finally {
367 			commitOrRollbackTx();
368 			if ( s != null && s.isOpen() ) {
369 				try {
370 					s.close();
371 				}
372 				catch (Throwable ignore) {
373 				}
374 			}
375 		}
376 
377 		beginTx();
378 		try {
379 			// cleanup
380 			s = openSession();
381 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
382 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
383 			// Because of HHH-9231, the following will fail due to ObjectNotFoundException because the
384 			// collection will be read from the cache and it still contains the uncommitted element,
385 			// which cannot be found.
386 			Hibernate.initialize( item.getBagOfItems() );
387 			assertTrue( item.getBagOfItems().isEmpty() );
388 			s.delete( item );
389 			txn.commit();
390 			s.close();
391 		}
392 		catch (Exception e) {
393 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
394 		}
395 		finally {
396 			commitOrRollbackTx();
397 		}
398 	}
399 
400 	@Test
401 	public void testAddNewManyToManyPropertyRefNoInitFlushInitLeaveCacheConsistent() throws Exception {
402 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
403 		stats.clear();
404 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics cStats = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() + ".items" );
405 
406 		OtherItem otherItem = null;
407 		Transaction txn = null;
408 		Session s = null;
409 
410 		beginTx();
411 		try {
412 			s = openSession();
413 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
414 			otherItem = new OtherItem();
415 			otherItem.setName( "steve" );
416 			s.save( otherItem );
417 			txn.commit();
418 			s.close();
419 		}
420 		catch (Exception e) {
421 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
422 		}
423 		finally {
424 			commitOrRollbackTx();
425 		}
426 
427 		// create an element for otherItem.bagOfItems
428 		Item item = new Item();
429 		item.setName( "element" );
430 		item.setDescription( "element Item" );
431 
432 		beginTx();
433 		try {
434 			s = openSession();
435 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
436 			otherItem = (OtherItem) s.get( OtherItem.class, otherItem.getId() );
437 			assertFalse( Hibernate.isInitialized( otherItem.getBagOfItems() ) );
438 			// Add an element to otherItem.bagOfItems (a bag); it will not initialize the bag.
439 			otherItem.addItemToBag( item );
440 			assertFalse( Hibernate.isInitialized( otherItem.getBagOfItems() ) );
441 			s.persist( item );
442 			s.flush();
443 			// Now initialize the collection; it will contain the uncommitted itemElement.
444 			// The many-to-many uses a property-ref
445 			Hibernate.initialize( otherItem.getBagOfItems() );
446 			setRollbackOnlyTx();
447 		}
448 		catch (Exception e) {
449 			setRollbackOnlyTxExpected(e);
450 		}
451 		finally {
452 			commitOrRollbackTx();
453 			if ( s != null && s.isOpen() ) {
454 				try {
455 					s.close();
456 				}
457 				catch (Throwable ignore) {
458 				}
459 			}
460 		}
461 
462 		beginTx();
463 		try {
464 			// cleanup
465 			s = openSession();
466 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
467 			otherItem = (OtherItem) s.get( OtherItem.class, otherItem.getId() );
468 			// Because of HHH-9231, the following will fail due to ObjectNotFoundException because the
469 			// collection will be read from the cache and it still contains the uncommitted element,
470 			// which cannot be found.
471 			Hibernate.initialize( otherItem.getBagOfItems() );
472 			assertTrue( otherItem.getBagOfItems().isEmpty() );
473 			s.delete( otherItem );
474 			txn.commit();
475 			s.close();
476 		}
477 		catch (Exception e) {
478 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
479 		}
480 		finally {
481 			commitOrRollbackTx();
482 		}
483 	}
484 
485 	@Test
486 	public void testStaleWritesLeaveCacheConsistent() throws Exception {
487 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
488 		stats.clear();
489 
490 		VersionedItem item = null;
491 		Transaction txn = null;
492 		Session s = null;
493 
494 		beginTx();
495 		try {
496 			s = openSession();
497 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
498 			item = new VersionedItem();
499 			item.setName( "steve" );
500 			item.setDescription( "steve's item" );
501 			s.save( item );
502 			txn.commit();
503 			s.close();
504 		}
505 		catch (Exception e) {
506 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
507 		}
508 		finally {
509 			commitOrRollbackTx();
510 		}
511 
512 		Long initialVersion = item.getVersion();
513 
514 		// manually revert the version property
515 		item.setVersion( new Long( item.getVersion().longValue() - 1 ) );
516 
517 		beginTx();
518 		try {
519 			s = openSession();
520 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
521 			s.update(item);
522 			txn.commit();
523 			fail("expected stale write to fail");
524 		}
525 		catch (Exception e) {
526 			setRollbackOnlyTxExpected(e);
527 		}
528 		finally {
529 			commitOrRollbackTx();
530 			if ( s != null && s.isOpen() ) {
531 				try {
532 					s.close();
533 				}
534 				catch (Throwable ignore) {
535 				}
536 			}
537 		}
538 
539 		// check the version value in the cache...
540 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics slcs = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( VersionedItem.class.getName() );
541 
542 		Object entry = slcs.getEntries().get( item.getId() );
543 		Long cachedVersionValue;
544 		cachedVersionValue = (Long) ((CacheEntry) entry).getVersion();
545 		assertEquals(initialVersion.longValue(), cachedVersionValue.longValue());
546 
547 		beginTx();
548 		try {
549 			// cleanup
550 			s = openSession();
551 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
552 			item = (VersionedItem) s.load( VersionedItem.class, item.getId() );
553 			s.delete( item );
554 			txn.commit();
555 			s.close();
556 		}
557 		catch (Exception e) {
558 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
559 		}
560 		finally {
561 			commitOrRollbackTx();
562 		}
563 	}
564 
565 	@Test
566 	@TestForIssue( jiraKey = "HHH-5690")
567 	public void testPersistEntityFlushRollbackNotInEntityCache() throws Exception {
568 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
569 		stats.clear();
570 
571 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics slcs = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() );
572 
573 		Item item = null;
574 		Transaction txn = null;
575 		Session s = null;
576 
577 		beginTx();
578 		try {
579 			s = openSession();
580 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
581 			item = new Item();
582 			item.setName( "steve" );
583 			item.setDescription( "steve's item" );
584 			s.persist( item );
585 			s.flush();
586 			assertNotNull( slcs.getEntries().get( item.getId() ) );
587 			setRollbackOnlyTx();
588 		}
589 		catch (Exception e) {
590 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
591 		}
592 		finally {
593 			commitOrRollbackTx();
594 			if ( s != null && s.isOpen() ) {
595 				try {
596 					s.close();
597 				}
598 				catch (Throwable ignore) {
599 				}
600 			}
601 		}
602 
603 		// item should not be in entity cache.
604 		assertTrue( slcs.getEntries().isEmpty() );
605 
606 		beginTx();
607 		try {
608 			s = openSession();
609 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
610 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
611 			assertNull( item );
612 			txn.commit();
613 			s.close();
614 		}
615 		catch (Exception e) {
616 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
617 		}
618 		finally {
619 			commitOrRollbackTx();
620 		}
621 	}
622 
623 	@Test
624 	@TestForIssue( jiraKey = "HHH-5690")
625 	public void testPersistEntityFlushEvictGetRollbackNotInEntityCache() throws Exception {
626 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
627 		stats.clear();
628 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics slcs = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() );
629 
630 		Item item = null;
631 		Transaction txn = null;
632 		Session s = null;
633 
634 		beginTx();
635 		try {
636 			s = openSession();
637 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
638 			item = new Item();
639 			item.setName( "steve" );
640 			item.setDescription( "steve's item" );
641 			s.persist( item );
642 			s.flush();
643 			// item is cached on insert.
644 			assertNotNull( slcs.getEntries().get( item.getId() ) );
645 			s.evict( item );
646 			assertEquals( slcs.getHitCount(), 0 );
647 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
648 			assertNotNull( item );
649 			assertEquals( slcs.getHitCount(), 1 );
650 			assertNotNull( slcs.getEntries().get( item.getId() ) );
651 			setRollbackOnlyTx();
652 		}
653 		catch (Exception e) {
654 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
655 		}
656 		finally {
657 			commitOrRollbackTx();
658 			if ( s != null && s.isOpen() ) {
659 				try {
660 					s.close();
661 				}
662 				catch (Throwable ignore) {
663 				}
664 			}
665 		}
666 
667 		// item should not be in entity cache.
668 		//slcs = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() );
669 		assertTrue( slcs.getEntries().isEmpty() );
670 
671 		beginTx();
672 		try {
673 			s = openSession();
674 			txn = s.beginTransaction();
675 			item = (Item) s.get( Item.class, item.getId() );
676 			assertNull( item );
677 			txn.commit();
678 			s.close();
679 		}
680 		catch (Exception e) {
681 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
682 		}
683 		finally {
684 			commitOrRollbackTx();
685 		}
686 	}
687 
688 	@Test
689 	public void testQueryCacheInvalidation() throws Exception {
690 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
691 		stats.clear();
692 
693 		SecondLevelCacheStatistics slcs = stats.getSecondLevelCacheStatistics( Item.class.getName() );
694 		sessionFactory().getCache().evictEntityRegion( Item.class.getName() );
695 
696 		assertEquals(0, slcs.getPutCount());
697 		assertEquals( 0, slcs.getElementCountInMemory() );
698 		assertEquals( 0, slcs.getEntries().size() );
699 
700 		Session s = null;
701 		Transaction t = null;
702 		Item i = null;
703 
704 		beginTx();
705 		try {
706 			s = openSession();
707 			t = s.beginTransaction();
708 			i = new Item();
709 			i.setName( "widget" );
710 			i.setDescription( "A really top-quality, full-featured widget." );
711 			s.persist( i );
712 			t.commit();
713 			s.close();
714 		}
715 		catch (Exception e) {
716 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
717 		}
718 		finally {
719 			commitOrRollbackTx();
720 		}
721 
722 
723 		assertEquals( 1, slcs.getPutCount() );
724 		assertEquals( 1, slcs.getElementCountInMemory() );
725 		assertEquals( 1, slcs.getEntries().size() );
726 
727 		beginTx();
728 		try {
729 			s = openSession();
730 			t = s.beginTransaction();
731 			i = (Item) s.get( Item.class, i.getId() );
732 			assertEquals( slcs.getHitCount(), 1 );
733 			assertEquals( slcs.getMissCount(), 0 );
734 			i.setDescription( "A bog standard item" );
735 			t.commit();
736 			s.close();
737 		}
738 		catch (Exception e) {
739 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
740 		}
741 		finally {
742 			commitOrRollbackTx();
743 		}
744 
745 		assertEquals( slcs.getPutCount(), 2 );
746 
747 		CacheEntry entry = (CacheEntry) slcs.getEntries().get( i.getId() );
748 		Serializable[] ser = entry.getDisassembledState();
749 		assertTrue( ser[0].equals( "widget" ) );
750 		assertTrue( ser[1].equals( "A bog standard item" ) );
751 
752 		beginTx();
753 		try {
754 			// cleanup
755 			s = openSession();
756 			t = s.beginTransaction();
757 			s.delete(i);
758 			t.commit();
759 			s.close();
760 		}
761 		catch (Exception e) {
762 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
763 		}
764 		finally {
765 			commitOrRollbackTx();
766 		}
767 	}
768 
769 	@Test
770 	public void testQueryCache() throws Exception {
771 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
772 		stats.clear();
773 
774 		Session s;
775 		Item item = new Item( "chris", "Chris's Item" );
776 
777 		beginTx();
778 		try {
779 			s = openSession();
780 			s.getTransaction().begin();
781 			s.persist( item );
782 			s.getTransaction().commit();
783 			s.close();
784 		}
785 		catch (Exception e) {
786 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
787 		}
788 		finally {
789 			commitOrRollbackTx();
790 		}
791 
792 		// Delay added to guarantee that query cache results won't be considered
793 		// as not up to date due to persist session and query results from first
794 		// query happening within same 100ms gap.
795 		Thread.sleep( 100 );
796 
797 		beginTx();
798 		try {
799 			s = openSession();
800 			s.createQuery( "from Item" ).setCacheable( true ).list();
801 			s.close();
802 		}
803 		catch (Exception e) {
804 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
805 		}
806 		finally {
807 			commitOrRollbackTx();
808 		}
809 
810 		beginTx();
811 		try {
812 			s = openSession();
813 			s.createQuery( "from Item" ).setCacheable( true ).list();
814 			assertEquals( 1, stats.getQueryCacheHitCount() );
815 			s.createQuery( "delete from Item" ).executeUpdate();
816 			s.close();
817 		}
818 		catch (Exception e) {
819 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
820 		}
821 		finally {
822 			commitOrRollbackTx();
823 		}
824 	}
825 
826 	@Test
827 	public void testQueryCacheHitInSameTransaction() throws Exception {
828 		Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
829 		stats.clear();
830 
831 		Session s = null;
832 		Item item = new Item( "galder", "Galder's Item" );
833 
834 		beginTx();
835 		try {
836 			s = openSession();
837 			s.getTransaction().begin();
838 			s.persist( item );
839 			s.getTransaction().commit();
840 			s.close();
841 		}
842 		catch (Exception e) {
843 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
844 		}
845 		finally {
846 			commitOrRollbackTx();
847 		}
848 
849 		// Delay added to guarantee that query cache results won't be considered
850 		// as not up to date due to persist session and query results from first
851 		// query happening within same 100ms gap.
852 		Thread.sleep( 100 );
853 
854 		beginTx();
855 		try {
856 			s = openSession();
857 			s.createQuery( "from Item" ).setCacheable( true ).list();
858 			s.createQuery( "from Item" ).setCacheable( true ).list();
859 			assertEquals( 1, stats.getQueryCacheHitCount() );
860 			s.close();
861 		}
862 		catch (Exception e) {
863 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
864 		}
865 		finally {
866 			commitOrRollbackTx();
867 		}
868 
869 		beginTx();
870 		try {
871 			s = openSession();
872 			s.createQuery( "delete from Item" ).executeUpdate();
873 			s.close();
874 		}
875 		catch (Exception e) {
876 			setRollbackOnlyTx( e );
877 		}
878 		finally {
879 			commitOrRollbackTx();
880 		}
881 	}
882 
883    @Test
884    public void testNaturalIdCached() throws Exception {
885       saveSomeCitizens();
886 
887       withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
888          @Override
889          public Void call() throws Exception {
890             Session s = openSession();
891             Transaction tx = s.beginTransaction();
892             State france = BasicTransactionalTestCase.this.getState(s, "Ile de France");
893             Criteria criteria = s.createCriteria( Citizen.class );
894             criteria.add( Restrictions.naturalId().set( "ssn", "1234" ).set( "state", france ) );
895             criteria.setCacheable( true );
896 
897             BasicTransactionalTestCase.this.cleanupCache();
898 
899             Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
900             stats.setStatisticsEnabled( true );
901             stats.clear();
902             assertEquals(
903                   "Cache hits should be empty", 0, stats
904                   .getNaturalIdCacheHitCount()
905             );
906 
907             // first query
908             List results = criteria.list();
909             assertEquals( 1, results.size() );
910             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Hits", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheHitCount() );
911             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Misses", 1, stats.getNaturalIdCacheMissCount() );
912             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Puts", 1, stats.getNaturalIdCachePutCount() );
913             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Queries", 1, stats.getNaturalIdQueryExecutionCount() );
914 
915             // query a second time - result should be cached in session
916             criteria.list();
917             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Hits", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheHitCount() );
918             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Misses", 1, stats.getNaturalIdCacheMissCount() );
919             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Puts", 1, stats.getNaturalIdCachePutCount() );
920             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Queries", 1, stats.getNaturalIdQueryExecutionCount() );
921 
922             // cleanup
923             tx.rollback();
924             s.close();
925             return null;
926          }
927       });
928    }
929 
930    @Test
931    public void testNaturalIdLoaderCached() throws Exception {
932       final Statistics stats = sessionFactory().getStatistics();
933       stats.setStatisticsEnabled( true );
934       stats.clear();
935 
936       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Hits", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheHitCount() );
937       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Misses", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheMissCount() );
938       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Puts", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCachePutCount() );
939       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Queries", 0, stats.getNaturalIdQueryExecutionCount() );
940 
941       saveSomeCitizens();
942 
943       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Hits", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheHitCount() );
944       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Misses", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheMissCount() );
945       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Puts", 2, stats.getNaturalIdCachePutCount() );
946       assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Queries", 0, stats.getNaturalIdQueryExecutionCount() );
947 
948       //Try NaturalIdLoadAccess after insert
949       final Citizen citizen = withTx(tm, new Callable<Citizen>() {
950          @Override
951          public Citizen call() throws Exception {
952             Session s = openSession();
953             Transaction tx = s.beginTransaction();
954             State france = BasicTransactionalTestCase.this.getState(s, "Ile de France");
955             NaturalIdLoadAccess naturalIdLoader = s.byNaturalId(Citizen.class);
956             naturalIdLoader.using("ssn", "1234").using("state", france);
957 
958             //Not clearing naturalId caches, should be warm from entity loading
959             stats.clear();
960 
961             // first query
962             Citizen citizen = (Citizen) naturalIdLoader.load();
963             assertNotNull(citizen);
964             assertEquals("NaturalId Cache Hits", 1, stats.getNaturalIdCacheHitCount());
965             assertEquals("NaturalId Cache Misses", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheMissCount());
966             assertEquals("NaturalId Cache Puts", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCachePutCount());
967             assertEquals("NaturalId Cache Queries", 0, stats.getNaturalIdQueryExecutionCount());
968 
969             // cleanup
970             tx.rollback();
971             s.close();
972             return citizen;
973          }
974       });
975 
976       // TODO: Clear caches manually via cache manager (it's faster!!)
977       this.cleanupCache();
978       Thread.sleep(PutFromLoadValidator.NAKED_PUT_INVALIDATION_PERIOD + TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(1));
979       stats.setStatisticsEnabled( true );
980       stats.clear();
981 
982       //Try NaturalIdLoadAccess
983       withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
984          @Override
985          public Void call() throws Exception {
986             Session s = openSession();
987             Transaction tx = s.beginTransaction();
988 
989             // first query
990             Citizen loadedCitizen = (Citizen) s.get( Citizen.class, citizen.getId() );
991             assertNotNull( loadedCitizen );
992             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Hits", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheHitCount() );
993             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Misses", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheMissCount() );
994             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Puts", 1, stats.getNaturalIdCachePutCount() );
995             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Queries", 0, stats.getNaturalIdQueryExecutionCount() );
996 
997             // cleanup
998             tx.rollback();
999             s.close();
1000             return null;
1001          }
1002       });
1003 
1004       // Try NaturalIdLoadAccess after load
1005       withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
1006          @Override
1007          public Void call() throws Exception {
1008             Session s = openSession();
1009             Transaction tx = s.beginTransaction();
1010             State france = BasicTransactionalTestCase.this.getState(s, "Ile de France");
1011             NaturalIdLoadAccess naturalIdLoader = s.byNaturalId(Citizen.class);
1012             naturalIdLoader.using( "ssn", "1234" ).using( "state", france );
1013 
1014             //Not clearing naturalId caches, should be warm from entity loading
1015             stats.setStatisticsEnabled( true );
1016             stats.clear();
1017 
1018             // first query
1019             Citizen loadedCitizen = (Citizen) naturalIdLoader.load();
1020             assertNotNull( loadedCitizen );
1021             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Hits", 1, stats.getNaturalIdCacheHitCount() );
1022             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Misses", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCacheMissCount() );
1023             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Puts", 0, stats.getNaturalIdCachePutCount() );
1024             assertEquals( "NaturalId Cache Queries", 0, stats.getNaturalIdQueryExecutionCount() );
1025 
1026             // cleanup
1027             tx.rollback();
1028             s.close();
1029             return null;
1030          }
1031       });
1032 
1033    }
1034 
1035    private void saveSomeCitizens() throws Exception {
1036       final Citizen c1 = new Citizen();
1037       c1.setFirstname( "Emmanuel" );
1038       c1.setLastname( "Bernard" );
1039       c1.setSsn( "1234" );
1040 
1041       final State france = new State();
1042       france.setName( "Ile de France" );
1043       c1.setState( france );
1044 
1045       final Citizen c2 = new Citizen();
1046       c2.setFirstname( "Gavin" );
1047       c2.setLastname( "King" );
1048       c2.setSsn( "000" );
1049       final State australia = new State();
1050       australia.setName( "Australia" );
1051       c2.setState( australia );
1052 
1053       withTx(tm, new Callable<Void>() {
1054          @Override
1055          public Void call() throws Exception {
1056             Session s = openSession();
1057             Transaction tx = s.beginTransaction();
1058             s.persist( australia );
1059             s.persist( france );
1060             s.persist( c1 );
1061             s.persist( c2 );
1062             tx.commit();
1063             s.close();
1064             return null;
1065          }
1066       });
1067    }
1068 
1069    private State getState(Session s, String name) {
1070       Criteria criteria = s.createCriteria( State.class );
1071       criteria.add( Restrictions.eq("name", name) );
1072       criteria.setCacheable(true);
1073       return (State) criteria.list().get( 0 );
1074    }

1076 }
